Partners & Sponsors

Adopt
a Blue Penguin

Symbolically adopt a Blue Penguin for 12 months.

The adoption package includes:

- Annual Supporter membership
- Adoption Certificate
- Blue Penguin Fact Sheet
- Information Brochure
- “I Love Penguins” stickers
- “I Love Penguins” stickers
- Bumper sticker
- Newsletter email subscription
- Blue penguin torch keyring

If you would like to purchase this as a gift for someone else, please add their name and address in the message box or email us at info@bluepenguin.org.nz.

$120 NZD

Adopt Now
